T02D3199:208a-1: a'arya t'a ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3199:208a-4: sngar bshad pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la /
T02D3199:208a-5: yi ge a'a: dmar po las byung ba'i padma dmar
T02D3199:208a-6: po'i steng du yi ge t'am dkar po las skyes
T02D3199:208a-7: pa'i padma'i snod du nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi
T02D3199:208a-8: ge h'um mthing nag las byung ba'i gri gug sa
T02D3199:208b-0: bon dang bcas pa yongs su gyur pa las @208b
T02D3199:208b-1: rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma nag mo ste
T02D3199:208b-2: zhal gcig ma spyan gsum mnga' ba /
T02D3199:208b-4: gsus pa 'phyang ba zhal mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D3199:208b-5: g-yas bskums pa'i zhabs kyis ro mnan pa /
T02D3199:208b-7: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D3199:208b-8: mgo bo'i phreng ba 'phyang bar gyur pa /
T02D3199:208b-9: phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D3199:208b-10: phyag g-yas pa dag gis ral gri dang gri gug bsnams pa /
T02D3199:208b-11: phyag g-yon pa dag gis autpala dang thod pa bsnams pa /
T02D3199:208b-12: mi bskyod pa'i dbu gnon dang ldan zhing ral pa ser po dang ldan pa /
T02D3199:208b-13: shin tu skrag par byed pa'i gad mo cher sgrogs pa /
T02D3199:208b-14: 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs su rdzogs par byas la /
T02D3199:208b-15: hrim hrim h'um phat ces bya ba'i sngags 'di dug dang /
T02D3199:208b-16: shes rab kyi dbang du byas la bzlas par bya ba'o //
T02D3199:208b-17: ral gri'i gnas su sgren po yis //
T02D3199:208b-18: mi rus phreg ba bsgom byas la //
T02D3199:208b-19: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D3199:208b-20: bla med gsang sngags bzlas par bya //
T02D3199:208b-22: rgya nag chen po'i lugs kyi 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so //
